job.title: Software Sr Engineer - Big data
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationltbrgtltbrgtAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredltbrgtltbrgtHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youltbrgtltbrgtTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsltbrgtltbrgtOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesltbrgtltbrgtCorporate Risk technology has embarked on an ambitious Risk Transformation program and as part of that were looking for a Software Sr Engineer Calculation Services who will partner with the key business risk and Enterprise Information Technology EIT leaders to drive all activities including strategy planning and implementation of key deliverables for the Calculation Services group which focuses on Model development testing and deployment areas Enterprise Risk CIO organization provides technology to several lines of business and is a 700 person global organization This team works closely with the Corporate Model Risk and Risk CoEs to ensure that the corporation meets its regulatory and compliance timelines This is a unique opportunity to make a huge impact to the Risk and Finance organization as various transformational projects are implementedltbrgtltbrgtSeeking a Seasoned candidate with experience in design development of enterprise systems and handling high volumes of data Domain knowledge in Financial risk and some handson keyboard experience Candidate will be part of the team which supports technology needs of Model Integration and Implementation for model life cycle activities like model development testing integration production runs and model performance monitoring Technologies used are a suite of stateoftheart Quant tools which include tools like Python R Spark Scala H2O etcltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilities IncludeltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDrives and participates in design development and implementation of large and complex application owning your solution through implementationltligtltligtWorks closely with developers and testers to ensure requirements and functional designs are translated accurately into working technical designs and that test plans and scripts meet customer needsltligtltligtWorks with developers and business partners to understand application defects performance problems and data anomaliesltligtltligtCreates a roadmap for implementation of various data preparation activities for model team and troubleshoots data questionsltligtltligtDrives requirements and design discussions in both Agile and Waterfall methodologies RWFltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequired Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt7 years of software engineering experienceltligtltligt3 years of securities industry experienceltligtltligt10 years of design implementation and governance experience with Artificial Intelligence Natural Language Processing or Machine Learning architectureltligtltligt6 years of experience in application ampamp data architecture and solution designltligtltligt4 years of experience with risk technology solution designltligtltligt3 years of experience in one or a combination of the following information security compliance operational risk management includes audit legal credit risk market risk or the management of a process or business with accountability for compliance or operational riskltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtDesired QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtAn industrystandard technology certificationltligtltligtStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsltligtltligtA BSBA degree or higher in science or technologyltligtltligtAgile experienceltligtltligtAbility to communicate effectively with a quantitative development team about models and integration strategiesltligtltligtAbility to gather analyze and interpret large datasetsltligtltligtAdvanced Microsoft Office Word Excel and Outlook skillsltligtltligtKnowledge and understanding of risk management or quantitative modelingltligtltligtStrong analytical skills with high attention to detail and accuracyltligtltligt5 years of data modeling experienceltligtltligtAdvanced problem solving and technical troubleshooting capabilitiesltligtltligtExperience articulating a complex problem design or build strategyltligtltligt5 years of experience delivering ETL data warehouse and data analytics capabilities on bigdata architecture such as Hadoopltligtltligt1 years of ETL data warehouse and data analytics delivery experience on internal or external cloud platformsltligtltligt2 years of risk and finance regulatory reporting experienceltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtOther Desired Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt3 years of experience in one or a combination of the following Consumer banking products securities risk quantitative trading artificial intelligence or machine learningltligtltligtBasic knowledge of industry regulations related to building technological solutionsltligtltligtAn industrystandard technology certificationltligtltligtAbility to assess issues make quick decisions implement solutions and influence changeltligtltligtAbility to gather and document technical requirementsltligtltligtAbility to identify plan and document system solutions that are cost effective and meet regulatory requirementsltligtltligtAbility to work effectively in virtual environment where key team members and partners are in various time zones and locationsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtJob ExpectationsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtAbility to travel up to 10 of the timeltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtStreet AddressltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtNJSummit ltstronggt190 River Rd  Summit NJltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtDisclaimerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAll offers for employment with Wells Fargo are contingent upon the candidate having successfully completed a criminal background check Wells
